data.text:
On arrival the male gentle man on reception was rude to us. 
In the morning the cleaners was knocking approx 08:30 to come in and make the bed, even though they don’t change your bed until after 4 nights of using them, I believe the same with the towels. 
Also knocked over and over the one day 4 times had to tell her we ain’t going out yet. 
On my birthday they did give a free bottle of Prosecco  and knocked our door with it, the same the following day as was my boyfriends birthday 
When Checking out had to pay 35 euros city tax, which was fine with but when arrived back to our country they had tried taking it another further 2 times, so tried to get us to pay 3 times, only we had no signal due to us being on the plane it didn’t go through and it had came up as fraud in the 3rd time 
Overall is a nice hotel but no balcony 
It is close to the station if wanting to go else where in Barcelona which is a plus 
Didn’t spend much time there, did try the 15th lounge floor bar cousins get it, will probably have to pay extra to gain access
data.title: SB hotel

data.text: Lovely hotel, staff and great room. Amazing breakfast choice, only fault was the hot food was cold. Mentioned this a few times but no change and suggested I spoke to restaurant manager, never saw them to speak to. Hopefully they have changed things
data.title: Excellent except for breakfast

data.text:
Staff is horrible and all seriousness are horrible,If you want to attend SPA obviously  is asking you to pay per person per hour also is asking you coins to get your clothes in a locker , I have never seen in any hotels such a terrible service .
Rooms are horrible looking very old also the bathroom , it is saying deluxe double room and they don’t even offer you a daily sachet of coffee or tea , bathtub is old and dirty from paint , not even a pear of  slippers.
Anyway is the worst service I have ever meet in a hotel , staff is just tuning the back and talking to you when you ask something .
Never again in this hotel!!!
data.title: Terrible, find a better hotel

data.text: I had booked a room in this hotel to celebrate my anniversary with my wife. Little did we know, they cancelled our reservation 3 weeks before our trip. They tried to take a prepayment from my card without prior notice, and as it was expected, my card blocked the payment as an unauthorised transaction and, almsot immediately, we got an automated cancellation email for our reservation. I provided authorisation and emailed them back as soon as I found out (within 5 minutes) and they responded a day later saying that they can't take the cancellation back and they're now fully booked. Never had such an experience before, especially with a 4 star hotel. It's been so distressing trying to find alternative accommodation last minute in busy Barcelona. If you want peace of mind with your holiday plans, do yourselves a favour and book somewhere else!
data.title: Unfair cancellation

data.text:
This hotel was the worst hotel experience I have experienced around the world. The staff was rude, impolite, and racist. The worst of all was the manager Daniel. He was rude, racist, and threatened to call the police on me as I was on the phone with Expedia to remove me from the hotel after the housekeeping went through my items twice. 

I told him that I did not appreciate how he was speaking to me, and he told me he didn't care. His staff beneath him was just as rude and unhelpful. Emphasis on his staff member Laura.

My room door would not properly lock, and could be opened without a door key. Then they moved me to a smoking room. Then after being moved, the housekeeping went through my things twice. I complained about it multiple times, and they did not care.

PLEASE, do not stay here. You will be in danger, and you will be treated like you are less then. To be treated like I was a criminal was so disheartening, and literally this was the worst hotel I have ever stayed at globally.

DO not stay here. I beg of you.
data.title: Do Not Stay Here!!
